title: 58 - Some Quiet Sunday
description: What a huge goddamn relief, it's a new My Favorite Murder! This week Karen and Georgia talk about the folie à deux of the Eriksson twins and the crimes of Mel Ignatow. Plus a hometown murder from comedian Kurt Braunohler.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
